headline: Gartner’s Q1 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Gartner’s first quarter results were shaped by a combination of continued contract value expansion and careful expense management, which helped the company deliver higher-than-expected non-GAAP earnings per share. Management highlighted that growth in its Research and Consulting segments, along with robust performance in Conferences, contributed to the positive outcome. CEO Gene Hall noted, “Contract value grew 7%, and we increased headcount across our sales organizations by 4%.” The quarter’s p
